name: referenced_fields
description: that are being referenced by the user in the conversation on init - all initiated fields should be included

name: user_approved
description: true if the user confirmed or agreed with the assistant’s summary

class_definitions.approved: user provided all information, and approved the assistant's summary
class_definitions.not_approved: user did not confirm the assistant's summary

name: assistant_response
description: the assistant’s next message — either a follow-up question or a confirmation summary phrased naturally

name: history
description: the updated conversation history including all relevant previous turns and the latest user message
